name: todotxt-mode
description: Commands and decorators for managing todo.txt files

commands.title: todotxt-mode: Sort by date of 'due' Tag
todotxt-mode: Format selected tasks with fields in specified order
todotxt-mode: Move tasks to Todo file
todotxt-mode: Move tasks to Waiting file
todotxt-mode: Move tasks to Someday file
todotxt-mode: Move tasks to Project Markdown file

todotxtmode.todoFilename.description: Name of main todo text file

todotxtmode.doneFilename.description: Name of archive file for completed tasks

todotxtmode.somedayFilename.description: Name of file for someday/maybe tasks

todotxtmode.waitingFilename.description: Name of file for deferred/waiting tasks

todotxtmode.sortCompletedTasksToEnd.description: Always place completed tasks at end of list when sorting

todotxtmode.removePriorityFromCompletedT.description: Remove the priority tag from completed tasks

todotxtmode.sectionDelimiterPattern.description: Regex pattern to delimit todo tasks section from other parts of the file

todotxtmode.todoFilePattern.decription: Regex pattern of filenames to apply todotxt-mode commands

todotxtmode.markdownFilePattern.decription: Regex pattern of Markdown filenames to apply todotxt-mode commands using markdownDecorationBeginPattern and markdownDecorationEndPattern

todotxtmode.excludeDecorationsFilePatter.description: Regex pattern of filenames to exclude todotxt-mode decorations

todotxtmode.markdownDecorationBeginPatte.description: Regex pattern of range in Markdown files to decorate

todotxtmode.markdownDecorationEndPattern.description: Regex pattern of range in Markdown files to decorate

todotxtmode.noteFilenameFormat.decription: Format for new note filenames. Can contain strftime-style format specifiers. The string '[Todo]', if used, will be selected.

todotxtmode.replaceNoteTextWithNoteTag.description: Automatically replace note text with the note tag when creating a note for a task
